A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If I could give this film a 0\, I most certainly would.

Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy gave the finger to all Star Wars fans and Lucas himself. The writing\, pacing\, and character development actually made me wish the First Order obliterated everyone and ruled the galaxy. Why are they portrayed as being completely incompetent?? The story gives you no reason to fear them\, especially General Hux.

The ENTIRE (3 hour) movie is undercut by horrible one-liners\, stupid jokes\, "gotcha" moments\, bb-8\, anti-white male sentiments\, and even anti-capitalism sentiments which is hilarious because without capitalism this movie wouldn't be possible... 

To Hell with you Rian Johnson... You didn't just stick to what made Star Wars great... in fact\, you took THE WORST parts of all Star Wars films and combined them into Episode 8.
